Cajun Tempeh Sandwich (Ragin' Cajun)

Ingredients

Ragin' Cajun (Tempeh) Sandwich

Bread - quality hamburger bun, toasted 120 calories, 2g fat

Coat the bread in ranch dressing (about, 1 1/2 tbsp) hard to say, need to calculate all this, but would guess about 130 calories, 13g fat

piece of lettuce negligibile

thick piece of tempeh, blackened with spices - 3/4 tsp of oil to keep spices on 320 calories, 18g fat, + the oil, 30 calories, 3g fat

slice of red onion

slice of avocado 100 calories, 9g fat

for a total of 700 calories 45g fat
